content.rendered:
On 31st October 2015 students from the STeP Center Aarohan, went to Mother Dairy Plant at Patpatganj (Delhi).

Total of 36 students along with Center Coordinator were present during the exposure visit. Mr. Ashok Verma, Sr. Executive, Mother Dairy Plant, interacted with the students and extended a warm welcome to all the students and briefed them about the development of the plant. He along with the unit explained to the students, the various steps involved in the packaging of milk and he also explained how the milk is brought to the unit from various unions in etherealized tankers and subjected to a number of tests before it is selected for packaging. Students were shown how the milk was subjected, pasteurized and homogenized before packaging.

During the visit, students asked several questions, were able to understand procedure of work and were able to clarify their doubts what exactly is needed to get a job in Retail Sector. At the end of the visit, Students were very happy and motivated.
